stepAnswer: By selling $$10$$ items, the revenue increases by $$50$$ revenue per item.
stepTitle: The revenue generated by selling $$x$$ items is given by $$R(x)=2x^2+10x$$. Find R'(10) and interpret.
answerLatex: By selling $$10$$ items, the revenue increases by $$50$$ revenue per item.
choices: By selling $$10$$ items, the revenue increases by $$50$$ revenue per item.
By selling $$10$$ items, the revenue increases by $$50$$ revenue per revenue.
By selling $$50$$ items, the revenue increases by $$10$$ revenue per item.
